title: When I Thought about Dying, I Was Caught by my Quibbling Childhood Friend - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life

description: Jun Kaai is contemplating suicide on a rooftop when he meets Azusa Suzuki, a cool-beauty childhood friend who hates useless things. A little before dying he decides to have a conversation with her.>
